summaries.new_features_summary: Added relocatable installation support, customizable module loader in Fl_dynload, OCAMLOPT_SHARED variable, and configure script improvements.
summaries.new_features:
- **Relocatable installation support** enabling prefix resolution through environment variables and directory traversal ([#72](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/72))
- **Customizable module loader** in `Fl_dynload.load_packages` with optional `loadfile` parameter for JSOO optimization ([#81](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/81))
- **OCAMLOPT_SHARED variable** support in build system for proper `.cmxs` file generation when using custom CC ([#69](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/69))
- **Configure script improvements** with shellcheck compatibility fixes and better POSIX compliance ([#73](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/73))
- **Installation method fix** reverting to `cp` for non-executable files to prevent incorrect permissions ([#86](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/86))
- **OCaml 5.x upgrade compatibility** fix for opam package detection ([#61](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/61))

summaries.brief_summary: Relocatable ocamlfind feature merged with new configure option for installation path flexibility
summaries.new_features_summary: Relocatable ocamlfind implementation with new configure option for path resolution flexibility
summaries.new_features:
- **Relocatable ocamlfind** implementation enables installation path independence with new `--with-relative-paths-at` configure option that resolves $PREFIX dynamically using readlink and environment variables ([#72](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/72))
- **Dynamic path resolution** system added to findlib core with automatic detection of installation directory from binary location, PATH environment variable, and LD_LIBRARY_PATH scanning
- **Enhanced configure script** with improved help documentation and relative path handling that converts absolute paths to `$PREFIX` variables for portability
- **New findlib configuration template** with path calculation functions for portable configuration files across different installation environments
summaries.activity_summary: Major relocatable feature implementation merged after extensive discussion and development since February 2024
summaries.activity:
- **Long-running relocatable feature** by [Marek Kubica](https://github.com/Leonidas-from-XIV) finally **merged** after development since February 2024, implementing comprehensive installation path flexibility ([#72](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/72))
- **Extensive technical discussion** with [@jonahbeckford](https://github.com/jonahbeckford) about configuration file portability, Windows compatibility, and alternative approaches using dune-like path variables versus environment variable detection
- **Major code changes** affecting 12 files with 406 additions and 127 deletions, primarily in configure script, findlib core modules, and configuration templates
summaries.contributors_summary: Marek Kubica implemented relocatable feature while Jonah Beckford provided detailed technical feedback and alternative approaches
summaries.contributors:
- [Marek Kubica](https://github.com/Leonidas-from-XIV) implemented the **relocatable ocamlfind** feature with comprehensive path resolution system, configure script enhancements, and new configuration templates ([#72](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/72))
- [@jonahbeckford](https://github.com/jonahbeckford) provided extensive **technical review** and **alternative design suggestions** focusing on configuration file portability, cross-platform compatibility, and dune-style path variable approaches

- **OCaml 5.x thread handling improvements** by [David Allsopp](https://github.com/dra27) - disabled various legacy thread handling parts for OCaml 5.x where threads.cmxa is now properly handled by META files ([#76](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/76))
- **OCaml 5.x compatibility function** added to detect when META files are available (`ocaml_has_meta_files` function in `findlib_config.mlp`)

- **Documentation improvements** by [Antonin Décimo](https://github.com/MisterDA) - fixed various typos across 14 files including documentation and interface files ([#62](https://github.com/ocaml/ocamlfind/issues/62))
